values: 策略；策划；战略；战术；规划；计划；计策；对策；方针；方法；手段；部署；战略学；战略部署；行动计划；全局规划；长远规划；统筹安排

word_mean_info__list.difference: 在军事上指在战场或军事行动中如何用兵的具体战术，多暗示指挥员在场具体指挥；也指为完成某计划而采取的策略或手段。
指全局性的前线战略部署，也可指为达到某种目的而采取的策略。

bilingual.source: The new strategy is cleverer than the old one.
bilingual.target: 新策略比旧策略更聪明。
每个玩家都有自己的策略。

bilingual.source: To play Go requires a lot of strategy.
bilingual.target: 下围棋需要很高的策略性。
我们必须研究对手的策略。
我们需要一个新的市场营销策略。
在这个游戏中，策略胜过运气。

bilingual.source: Assault is a common strategy in warfare.
bilingual.target: 冲锋是战争中的常见策略。

bilingual.source: This is a contest of wit and strategy.
bilingual.target: 这是一场智慧与策略的博弈。
我们必须加宽我们的市场策略。
她的投资策略非常成功。

list.abstract: strategy，英文单词，名词，翻译为战略、策略。

yingyinNormal.en: It's like if someone accidentally sent you their courtroom strategy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就像有人不小心把庭审策略发给你了。

yingyinNormal.en: And you sabotaged my defense strategy and I want to know why.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且你搅黄了我的辩护策略，我想知道是为什么。

yingyinNormal.en: I need to know how you're going to fight back. I know there's a strategy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想知道你们怎样反击，我知道肯定有什么策略。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, they're not talking about trial strategy, they're talking about moving Diane out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们讨论的不是庭审策略，而是怎么排挤戴安。

yingyinNormal.en: As part of our defensive strategy, 31 developed a new photon torpedo.
yingyinNormal.zh: 作为我们防御策略的一部分，31区发明了一种新型光子鱼雷。

yingyinNormal.en: So I won't ask about trial strategy. This is about the prosecution perjuring themselves.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以我不会问检控策略的，这是关于控方作假证。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, until he resigned two days ago. Yes, but he was privy to our trial strategy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，直到两天前他辞职了。是，但他了解我们的检控策略。

yingyinNormal.en: You will command overall strategy. Your toon leaders will each command a battle group.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你将控制总体策略，你的小队长们将各领导一个战略小组。

yingyinNormal.en: No. Ultron could've assimilated Jarvis. This isn't strategy, this is rage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，奥创本可以同化贾维斯的，他这么做并非出于策略而是...愤怒。

yingyinNormal.en: Ruth has agreed to come on board. And she has a campaign strategy that is very good. Good. Good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 鲁斯答应入伙了，并且她的竞选策略非常...完美。很好，很好。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not what he did. It's why he did it. It was tactical. A strategy to stop future attacks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 关键不在于他干了什么，而在于他的动机 这是战术，一个能避免未来冲突的策略

yingyinNormal.en: You have a deep sense of duty, like all the men and women here who served their country, and that's far more important to me than strategy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有很深的责任感，就像这里埋葬的所有为国捐躯的男男女女，这对我来说比策略重要多了。

yingyinNormal.en: As America's steel giants fell, it pursued a maverick strategy, buying up scrap-metal yards like this all across the country and focusing its entire business on recycling.
yingyinNormal.zh: 随着美国钢铁巨人的倒下，他采取了一种不同寻常的策略，买下像这样的废铁在全国范围内致力于回收再造。

yingyinNormal.en: We've been working to secure bipartisan support for this strategy here at home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们一直致力于获得两党共同支持，实施这一战略保证国内安全。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Give us a day to discuss strategy. Actually, we need to discuss this. No, we don't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 给我们一天时间来讨论下对策。反倒是这个案件要先讨论下。这不用讨论了。

yingyinNormal.en: I just got used to being hot and sweaty all the time. This electric furnace is key to Nucor's innovative strategy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得很热,一直在流汗。这个电弧炉是钢铁公司主要的创新产品。

yingyinNormal.en: What happened to my "Day in court"? That was just a strategy to get you out on bail. But I think I want it, though.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那所谓的"上庭"呢？那只是为了让你获得假释说的话。但是，我就是想上庭。

yingyinNormal.en: So we're staying vigilant. And we're moving ahead with our strategy to degrade and ultimately destroy this terrorist organization.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因此，我们要保持警惕。而且我们也正在实施我们的战略，逐步打击直至完全消灭这一恐怖组织。

yingyinNormal.en: And last week, Secretary of State Kerry, Secretary of Defense Hagel and military leaders worked to gain their support for our strategy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 上周，国务卿克里，国防部长哈格尔以及众多军队领袖一起争取到了国会对我们的反恐战略的支持。

yingyinNormal.en: A majority of Democrats and a majority of Republicans in both the House and the Senate have now approved a first, key part of our strategy by wide margins.
yingyinNormal.zh: 参众两院大多数民主党和共和党人都在广泛范围内支持这一战略的首要部分。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 业务战略；商业战略；经营战略

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 战略的；战略上的；关键的；认真谋划的；仔细策划的；战争所必需的；战略性的

word_family.mean: n. 战略；战略部署；战略学

sense_info_list.en: a plan of action or policy designed to achieve a major or overall aim

examination_example.sentence: India released its AI ethics <highlight>strategy</highlight> this spring.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 印度于今年春天发布了人工智能伦理战略。

examination_example.sentence: Instead of wordy, worthy <highlight>strategies</highlight>, future governments need to do more to provide the conditions for sport to thrive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 未来的政府需要做更多的事情来为体育的蓬勃发展提供条件，而不是冗长的花架子策略。

examination_example.sentence: There were goals, there were <highlight>strategies</highlight>, there were objectives, but we didn't talk about energy; we didn't talk about passion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有目标、有策略、有宗旨，但我们不谈论精力，我们不谈论激情。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 营销策略；市场营销策略；营销战略

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 战略的；战略上的；关键的；认真谋划的；仔细策划的；战争所必需的；战略性的

word_family.mean: n. 战略；战略部署；战略学

sense_info_list.en: a plan of action or policy designed to achieve a major or overall aim

examination_example.sentence: He mastered the use of corporate <highlight>strategy</highlight>, media relations, government lobbying, international diplomacy, patents, and prosecution.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他精通运用公司战略、媒体关系、政府游说、国际外交、专利和起诉。

examination_example.sentence: In a world where people are increasingly dependent on their phones, though, such <highlight>strategies</highlight> often fail.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，在一个人们越来越依赖手机的世界里，这种策略往往会失败。

examination_example.sentence: The most promising <highlight>strategy</highlight> has become to harness one foe against the other.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最有希望的战略就是: 利用一个敌人来制约另一个。

direction_info.description:

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 战略的；战略上的；关键的；认真谋划的；仔细策划的；战争所必需的；战略性的

word_family.mean: n. 战略；战略部署；战略学

sense_info_list.en: a plan of action or policy designed to achieve a major or overall aim

examination_example.sentence: The city's council and ScottishPower have announced a range of <highlight>strategies</highlight> in an attempt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 市议会和Scottish电力公司已经宣布了一系列政策。

examination_example.sentence: Putting TV characters on lunch boxes proved an effective marketing <highlight>strategy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将电视角色印在饭盒上被证明是一种有效的营销策略。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 计谋; 行动计划; 策略

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 计谋; 行动计划; 策略

examination_example.sentence: All in all, these two <highlight>strategies</highlight> are sure to help with fear of public speaking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总而言之，这两个策略肯定有助于消除公众演讲的恐惧。

examination_example.sentence: He was admired by everyone because he taught the young the tricks and <highlight>strategies</highlight> of survival (生存策略).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人都钦佩他，因为他教会了年轻人生存的技巧和策略。

examination_example.sentence: Please teach him the tricks and <highlight>strategies</highlight> of survival
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请教他生存的诀窍和策略
